message: I'm ready! Can you recommend me a meal based on my preferences?

chat_history.content: Hi, can you add a constraint for low-carb meals?
I've added low-carb to your dietary restrictions! This means I can help you discover meals that better align with your preferences.
Actually, make that under 500 calories too
I've updated your calorie target to 500. Your preferences are now set to low-carb and under 500 calories!
